stimulusHtml: Two blocks of masses M and m, with M > m, are connected by a light string. The string passes over a frictionless pulley of negligible mass so that the blocks hang vertically. The blocks are then released from rest. What is the acceleration of the block of mass M ?
choicesHtml: M − m m g MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DF9@

M + m m g MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DEE@

M + m M − m g MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FAD@

M − m M + m g MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FAD@
